With a very casual 1835.7 hours and not landed on anything other than the Mun and Minmus, you might have guessed I am very easily distracted. Is there a simple way or small edit I can make to a cfg file to restrict part test contracts to a specific manufacture, for example the weapon systems installed through  BD armoury mod?

For hard mode, I would also like to change the science experiment on survey contracts to testing weapons as well.

Cheers
